name: Kuki Shinobu
storytext: Master of all trades, deputy of the oni.
source: Reward for inviting Kuki Shinobu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Sanctifying Ring
skills.descriptionraw: Summons a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114111]</color>. If this character has at least 6 HP, then she deals 2 $[K5] to herself.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Summons a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grass Ring of Sanctification</color>. If this character has at least 6 HP, then she deals 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to herself.
skills.description: Summons a Grass Ring of Sanctification. If this character has at least 6 HP, then she deals 2 Piercing DMG to herself.

skills.name: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], heals this character for 2 HP.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, heals this character for 2 HP.
skills.description: Deals 4 Electro DMG, heals this character for 2 HP.
